name: tusbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))

stmt.origin: simp1d(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c2)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2)))
stmt.pretty: simp1d(c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1), c1 =(Base ` c2), c0 =(UnifSet ` c2), (unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c2)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→ c1 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(c1 =(Base ` c2)∧ c0 =(UnifSet ` c2)∧(unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c2)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→ c1 =(Base ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(c1 =(Base ` c2)∧ c0 =(UnifSet ` c2)∧(unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), w3a(wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cunif, c2)), wceq(cfv(cutop, c0), cfv(ctopn, c2))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctus, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnifOn ` c1)→(c1 =(Base ` c2)∧ c0 =(UnifSet ` c2)∧(unifTop ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c2)))
⊣ c2 =(toUnifSp ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cust, c1)), wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctus, c0))

comment: The base set of a constructed uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Dec-2017.)
